amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds in the bill from being made available for the Ruminant Nutrition Consortium (MT, ND, SD, WY) grant.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in Part B of House Report 110-290 to prohibit use of funds for the Ruminant Nutrition Consortium (MT, ND, SD, and WY).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 74 - 355 (Roll no. 812).
